metadata.title: CVE-2024-36033 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: fix info leak when fetching board id Add the missing sanitycheck when fetching the board id to avoid leaking slab data when laterrequesting the firmware.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
